details: Updated Copilot model version in documentation from `copilot_gpt_4o` to `copilot_gpt_41`.

raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated Copilot model version in documentation from `copilot_gpt_4o` to `copilot_gpt_41`.
- Deleted unused image assets (hero-2.png, hero-3.png, etc.) and orphaned feature files (codeql-no-build.yml, secret-scanning-alert-plaid-filters.yml).
- Removed deprecated reusable documentation files (custom-coding-guidelines-prerequisites.md, pull_request_merges_and_contributions.md).
- Adjusted REST API schemas to allow `sha` properties to be `null` across multiple endpoints and versions.
- Updated SHA references in GitHub Apps and REST config files.
